name: Keep Blue Dot Alive
description:
Keep Blue Dot Alive Ludum Dare #46 Entry for theme "Keep It Alive"

Mouse to control. Pull back to shoot.

You should protect the blue dot in the center from yellow enemies. Be aware squares - they are most powerful.

Font is Bungee from Google Fonts. You can find it here.
Background music done by me with audiotool.com. Track from game is here. Other sounds from 99sounds.com. Drum Samples here.

by agegorin
